legacy.full_text: While everyone is talking about tokenizing stocks, two seminal & monumental quantum talks at @EthCC today from two of best q researchers in the world @fabgenovese from @nvrlcl & @asanso from @ethereumfndn. The future of everything blockchain depends on this kind of work. https://t.co/C0Yt8jXEJB

value.string_value: Quantum computers pose a threat to Ethereum. How do we transition into a post-quantum era? We built an open-source library to tackle this challenge! Meet:"po...
István András Seres (Eötvös Loránd University)_poqeth: Efficient,...

legacy.full_text:
@LilicJohn @EthCC @fabgenovese @nvrlcl @asanso @ethereumfndn ICYMI 

🔏We built an open-source Solidity library to verify NIST/IETF standardized PQ signatures (W-OTS+, XMSS, SPHINCS+, and MAYO) in the EVM for PQ-secure transactions. 

📄Paper (AsiaCCS'25): https://t.co/qBLIjQBpaZ
💻Repo: https://t.co/ex7RoTUXZy

🎥https://t.co/LbmojkEtdE

result.text: Depends on which roadmaps you believe. IonQ says 2500 logical qubits by 2028. IBM 200 logical qubits. If you overlay roadmaps of everyone from DARPA to Riverlane & everyone else then convergence seems to be around 2029-30. I guess military/intelligence will capabilities before market.

legacy.full_text:
@LilicJohn @EthCC @fabgenovese @nvrlcl @asanso @ethereumfndn feels like everyone’s staring at charts while real infra shifts are happening

need to pay more attention to this side
